article_title: No longer behind the curve: Black churches address mental illness
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

(RNS) As fans of Robin Williams reel from the news of his suicide, faith communities -- including the nation’s black churches -- have started to address mental illness as a crucial area of focus.

article_metadata.news_keywords: Culture, Institutions, black churches, Christian, mental health, suicide
